item.title: Flare-On 2022 - Magic 8 Ball
item.description: Challenge Description You got a question? Ask the 8 ball! Basic Static Analysis +------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ | md5 | 3c2d4ea7b946596096bf039d0043a07b | | sha1 | ae41beb01a7caa07a5b6e847a7c04016539cba64 | | sha256 | 2fcead898d8f900715c9201f246d040eb9686b8f732e683518e8ef92d26dfa89 | | os | windows | | format | pe | | arch | i386 | | path | Magic8Ball.exe | +------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+ We are given a Windows x32 exe and a bunch of DLLs and an assets directory. remnux@remnux:~/flare/magic8$ file * Magic8Ball.exe: PE32 executable (GUI) Intel 80386, for MS Windows libjpeg-9.
